statements: DELETE FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE units_sold > 500 AND performance_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE product_id = 100 AND units_sold > 50;
DELETE FROM ProductPerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating < 3 AND revenue <= 500.00;
DELETE FROM slow-moving_items WHERE days_on_shelf > 30 AND price < 50.00;
DELETE FROM product_performance_metrics WHERE product_id = 100 AND revenue > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM slow-moving_items WHERE days_on_shelf < 30 OR price < 100.00;
DELETE FROM promotion_items WHERE item_id = 100 AND promotion_category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM product_performance_metrics WHERE product_id = 101 AND sales_amount > 5000;
